## ErrorXActionRedirect type

Action to redirect the user to a different URL when an error occurs. Commonly used for navigation after authentication errors or access denied scenarios.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorXActionRedirect = {
    action: 'redirect';
    redirectURL: string;
    [key: string]: any;
};
```

## Example


```typescript
{
  action: 'redirect',
  redirectURL: '/login',
  delay: 2000,
  replace: true
}
```
